scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name shop-pzm-ae-frontend
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --branch staging --project-name shop-pzm-ae-frontend
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && wrangler pages deploy ./dist --branch production --project-name shop-pzm-ae-frontend
